title: Code Examples and References
body_html:
Code Examples and References

Where to Look in Huly

  • Trigger patterns: server-plugins/*-resources/src/
  • Model definitions: models/*/src/
  • Transaction types: models/core/src/

Example Snippets

  • Trigger skeletons
  • API route handlers
  • Delivery service method signatures

Tips

  • Start small: issue created/updated
  • Add filters incrementally
  • Collect metrics early
